props.itemName: Name of the property that hold name of item
props.itemChildren: Name of the property that hold name of array of children
props.itemIcon: Name of the property that hold name of item's icon. Valid name is the same as for v-icon name prop
props.itemDisabled: Name of the property for disabled items. Disabling folder also disable all of its children
props.itemKey: Name of the required property that hold unique value for every item.
props.autoOpenRoot: If `true` mounts tree with root node opened
props.autoOpenAll: If `true` mounts tree with all nodes opened
props.selectReturnKeys: If `true` @input:selected return array of item keys. If `false` (default) this event returns `array` of item `objects`
props.selectIndependent: If `true` folders and items can be selected independently. By default selecting folders selects all children items and selecting every children selects parent folder
props.openOnClick: If `true` clicking on labels opens folders. Clicking indicators always opens folders
props.allowSelectDisabled: If `true` disabled items can be selected
props.allowOpenDisabled: If `true` disabled folders items can be opened
props.showIcons: Displays icons if icon or placeholder icon is set
props.placeholderItemIcon: Default icon for items if no icon is provided in `items` prop
props.placeholderFolderIcon: Default icon for folders if no icon is provided in items prop. If value is `array` then icons are respectively for closed and opened folders
props.chevron: Attributes of v-chevron (open indicator) component. See documentation for valid values
props.transition: Sets animation effect when opening or closing folders. Valid values are: 'fade', 'fade-slide', or `empty string` to disable animations.

emits.input:selected: Fired when item is selected. Passes array of selected items

slots.item: Slot for complete customization of appearance of items. Other slots are unavailable when using this slot
slots.item-prepend: Slot for content that prepends item name
slots.name: Slot for items name
slots.item-append: Slot for content that is appended to item name

functions.openAllLevel(level: Number): Opens all nodes on level (0 for root, any high number to open all nodes)
